entry.tran: 说话下流的;满嘴脏话的
entry.def: If you describe someone as foul-mouthed, you disapprove of them because they use offensive words or say very rude things.

example.tran: 他是一个粗俗无礼、满嘴脏话的恶棍。

sentences.sentence: "noisy foul-mouthed women all shouting at once"
